ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Recall context for survey
Notes: e.g., ''Thinking of your entire lifetime'' or ''Since April 1, 2020''

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there any time when you or someone in your household wanted or needed health care or a health check-up?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there any time when you or someone in your household wanted or needed mental health care or counseling?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there any time when you or someone in your household wanted or needed help for their drinking?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there any time when you or someone in your household needed but did not receive health care or a health check-up?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Was there any time when you or someone in your household needed but did not receive mental health care or counseling?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: Since [nas_recall], was there any time when you or someone in your household needed but did not receive help for their drinking?
Notes: 1 = No; 2 = Yes, myself only; 3 = Yes, someone else only; 4 = Yes, both myself and someone else; 99 = No answer

ElementDescription: [nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (You could not get an appointment soon enough.)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (The (providers) were not seeing anyone in person)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (You could not afford it)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (You were afraid of getting COVID)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (You had covid-like symptoms or you were sick with COVID)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (You were following stay-at-home orders)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (I have not delayed getting care)
[nas_recall] - Have you delayed getting care for your health, mental health, or drinking for any of the following reasons? (No answer)
[nas_recall] - Did you receive care from a health care provider?
Received care from a health care provider - Was this by electronic messaging or email, phone or videochat?
[nas_recall] - Did you receive care from a substance use counselor?
Received care from a substance use counselor - Was this by electronic messaging or email, phone or videochat?
[nas_recall] - Did you receive care from a mental health counselor?
Received care from a mental health counselor - Was this by electronic messaging or email, phone or videochat?
[nas_recall] - Did you receive care from a mutual help group such as Alcoholics Anonymous (these groups are sometimes called self-help groups)?
Received care from a mutual help group/self-help group - Was this by electronic messaging or email, phone or videochat?
[nas_recall] - Did you receive care from a community organization or services agency.
Received care from a community organization or services agency - Was this by electronic messaging or email, phone or videochat?
